ValidationRule.description: Ensures that only one role is chosen.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Client"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Child"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Other important family member"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Trust"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Employee"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Mortgage borrower"),1,0) + IF(INCLUDES(Roles, "Deceased Client"),1,0)) > 1
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only one role can be chosen.
